001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003public interface POAGradeView {
004  void setIsEnabled(boolean isEnabled);
005
006  void setIsLate(boolean isLate);
007
008  void addIsLateHandler(IsLateHandler handler);
009
010  void setTotalPoints(String totalPoints);
011
012  void addScoreValueHandler(ScoreValueHandler handler);
013
014  void setErrorInScore(boolean errorInScore);
015
016  void setScore(String score);
017
018  void setScoreHasBeenRecorded(boolean hasScoreBeenRecorded);
019
020  void addRecordGradeHandler(RecordGradeHandler handler);
021
022  public interface IsLateHandler {
023    void setIsLate(boolean isLate);
024  }
025
026  public interface ScoreValueHandler {
027    void scoreValue(String value);
028  }
029
030  public interface RecordGradeHandler {
031    void recordGrade();
032  }
033}
